text: Francisca Xavier Queiroz de Jesus, known professionally as Chica Xavier (January 22, 1932 – August 8, 2020), was a Brazilian actress.Atriz Chica Xavier, que acaba de ganhar biografia, é mãe de santo em Sepetiba Xavier was born in Salvador, Bahia. Her best known movie roles were in Sinhá Moça (1986), O Rei do Gado (1996), Força de um Desejo (1999), Esperança (2002), Um Só Coração (2004) and Duas Caras (2007). Xavier died of lung cancer on August 8, 2020 in Rio de Janeiro at the age of 88.Morre a atriz Chica Xavier, aos 88 anos, vítima de câncer ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian stage actors Category:People from Salvador, Bahia
title: Chica Xavier
